overview: Kirby sends his henchmen to break killer Matt Brawley out of jail. But Brawley has already broken out and they return with Fuzzy instead. Realizing they think he's Brawley, Fuzzy plays the part. He and Bill plan to round up the gang but Fuzzy is in trouble when the real Brawley shows up to expose the hoax.
tagline: His Blazing Guns and Swinging Fists Tame the Toughest Bandit Gang!
title: Stagecoach Outlaws
